messages.zh: 第七关（前）
messages.tl: Seventh level (front)

messages.zh: 是我的错觉，还是天确实越来越暗了？
messages.tl: Is it my illusion, or is the sky really getting darker?

messages.zh: 啧，裸眼看到灾云凝聚可不是什么好兆头。
messages.tl: Hey, it’s not a good sign that the naked eye sees the cloud.

messages.zh: 加上，下城区的每一条街道都可能埋伏着整合运动......
messages.tl: Plus, every street in the lower city may ambush the Reunion Movement...

messages.zh: 不，这个说法太过保守。
messages.tl: No, this statement is too conservative.

messages.zh: 该说是，整合运动满满当当地挤在街上。
messages.tl: The saying is that the Reunion Movement is full of local crowds on the street.

messages.zh: 只能说，形势不容乐观。
messages.tl: It can only be said that the situation is not optimistic.

messages.zh: 几乎每条街上都有暴徒在搞破坏......
messages.tl: There are mobs on almost every street who are doing damage...

messages.zh: 这帮家伙，是觉得天气太好，所以出来野餐集会吗！
messages.tl: These guys think the weather is so good, so come out for a picnic gathering!

messages.zh: 这......不太可能啊，天灾野餐，从来没听说过呀。
messages.tl: This...not very likely, the natural disaster picnic, never heard of it.

messages.zh: 我，我只是发个牢骚，不是那个意思......
messages.tl: I, I just complained, not that...

messages.zh: 抱歉，总是在这种时候......
messages.tl: Sorry, always at this time...
it does not matter......!

messages.zh: 接下来，我们需要侦查干员搜集情报，再做下一步的打算。
messages.tl: Next, we need to investigate the information collected by the cadres and plan for the next step.

messages.zh: 在这之前......先得给他们创造空间。
messages.tl: Before that... I have to create space for them.

messages.zh: 四点钟方向的敌人，安静地处理掉。不要惊动其他人。
messages.tl: The enemy at four o'clock is quietly disposed of. Don't alarm other people.

messages.zh: 交给我吧。这算是我比较擅长的工作——
messages.tl: give it to me. This is a job I am good at -

messages.zh: 只要他们体内的病变器官不是什么警报器或爆破物就行。
messages.tl: As long as the diseased organs in their bodies are not alarms or explosives.

messages.zh: ——行动！
messages.tl: --action!
